trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_SEQ_00<tab>Error 5318008: Grebuloffs not found.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_TODO_00<tab>Search for the overcurious Grebuloffs.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_TODO_01<tab>Report to Stigma-4.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_STIGMA4_000_001<tab>Irregular population fluctuations detected. Your assistance is required to search for two missing Grebuloffs.

TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_STIGMA4_000_002<tab>Analysis indicates insatiable curiosity and a proclivity for exploration in both units, making “voluntary expedition” the most likely explanation for their sudden disappearance.

TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_STIGMA4_000_003<tab>However, given the length of absence and approximate levels of danger in the surrounding areas, the likelihood that they currently face mortal peril exceeds recommended parameters.

TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_STIGMA4_000_004<tab>Please initiate your search immediately and aid the return of the two missing Grebuloffs. In the event they have been reduced to pieces, please collect and return accordingly.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFA04616_000_010<tab>Oh, would you look how it shimmers and shines! Be still my quivering whiskers! ...Hm? Can I help you?
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFA04616_000_011<tab>The others are looking for me? My apologies. So enraptured was I with this place, I completely lost track of time.

TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFA04616_000_012<tab>Glittering landmarks much like this one could once be seen in the waters of our home, but they carried a terrible sickness. I never dared to dream I might find anything so similar in a place such as this.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFA04616_000_013<tab><sigh> Would that I could stay and behold its beauty a while longer, but as you say, my kin are worried. Another time, perhaps.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFB04616_000_015<tab><grumble> <grumble> Oh, what I wouldn't do for something to eat...
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFB04616_100_015<tab>Bwaaah! Who... What are you doing here?
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFB04616_000_016<tab>I'm being called back home? But the Ea promised there would be food. It should be ready any moment now.

TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFB04616_000_017<tab>At least, that's what they told me. Yet no matter how long I wait, there has been nothing. <sigh> Perhaps I misunderstood when they invited me to join them in communal repast. I think I'll stop by the café on the way back, and eat something there.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFC04616_000_018<tab>I... <heave> I fear I've made a terrible mist─ <retch>
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFC04616_000_019<tab>Return home? Gladly. Seeing the dragons partake of the water, I thought it safe enough for a quick swim, but I was wrong. So very, very wrong...
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFC04616_000_020<tab>Well, I've given my stomach enough trouble for one day. I should be returning home. If you'll excuse me.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFD04616_000_022<tab>Hm? What brings you out here?
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFD04616_000_023<tab>Oh, I... I didn't mean to make the others worry. I stumbled upon these remains, and couldn't help but think of our fallen kin...
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFD04616_000_024<tab>Ahem. But now is not the time for sulking─it only serves to make the others worry. It was nice meeting you.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFE04616_000_025<tab>Hm...? Ah, my apologies. I was marveling at the craftsmanship of this place.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFE04616_000_026<tab>The others sent you to bring me home? Goodness, how long have I been away? It seems I lost track of time admiring all this metalwork.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFE04616_000_027<tab>Perhaps one of the service nodes at the café would be willing to tell me more about it.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFF04616_000_028<tab>Would you look at that eye? No doubt it keeps watch over everything in this space.

TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFF04616_000_029<tab>You came looking for me? Hopefully my absence hasn't caused too much of a stir. I was captivated by the giant eye there, and soon found myself lost in thought.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_GREBULOFFF04616_000_030<tab>Fear not─when I return, I intend to work twice as hard to make up for my time spent here. We will make an Elysion worth watching, just wait and see.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_STIGMA4_000_031<tab>Return of wayward units confirmed. Influx of Grebuloff gratitude determined to be corollary.

TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_STIGMA4_000_032<tab>After the dissemination of verbal testimony by recently returned Grebuloffs, interest in the exploration of foreign regions has experienced a marked increase in other adventurous units.
TEXT_BANOMI110_04616_STIGMA4_000_033<tab>Probability of future employment opportunities high. Rest and recuperation are advised.
